t: Amazon.com : Marmite Yeast Extract (500g) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I may be biased (being British) but I absolutely love this marmite. For the price, it was pretty great, as you get a massive jar. Really good quality and lovely Savory, punchy flavor. Works perfectly with butter and toast. Just the perfect comfort food.

t: Amazon.com : Marmite Yeast Extract Original 125g : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: I saw a video where Americans tried English foods, and it was 50/50 on the Marmite. I had to try it. Actually, this stuff was tasty. I recommend you spread it very thin on the bread then add more if it agrees with you. It was supposed to have a yeasty taste, but I thought it was mainly just salty.

t: Amazon.com : Marmite 600g tub (pack of 2) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: Customers find the Marmite delicious with a great salty taste, and one mentions using it in homemade soups and gravies. The large tubs offer good value, and customers appreciate its health benefits as an excellent vitamin source. Moreover, the product arrives in perfect condition, and one customer ...

t: Amazon.com : 500g Marmite 2 Pack (1000g Total) : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: My neighbor across the street is British, and she loves her Marmite. She has always purchased the small jar for a ridiculous sum of money at a British goods market, and she was absolutely thrilled to receive this gigantic bottle as a gift. A much better value for money than the small jar.
